TopicTitle: Challenge: Build a space station around Kerbol

Articles.Content: Build a space station in a low Kerbol orbit, in a low orbit around the sun. The station should have at least 3 modules that are all seperately launched, each one with a different rocket design. All these launches are to be unmanned, as your 4th launch will get the 1st crew to the station. Then launch your 5th and final rocket with your second crew. After the second crew arrived at the station, return the first crew to kerbin and leave enough fuel at the station to rturn the second crew too. Upload photos of your station and of this challenge if you want, I'd love to see many great stations ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif) Or make a youtube video, that would be even better ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)

This just doesn't have any challenge to it and it feels like just another contract that doesn't pay any Kredits. Most people would meet these requirements with little effort.

for example;

The challenge is to build a sustainable colony in space.

You get 1 point for every Kerbal (each kerbal requires 5e/s and 500e storage capacity) all living quarters must have artificial gravity (9.82 m/s\*s) and no Kerbels are allowed to live in command modules.

You are limited to 5 launches

You lose 1 point for every 100,000 Kredits spent

If your Colony requires monoprop for starting stopping artificial gravity for docking purposes you need enough spare for 200 docks

Orbit is required to be 'low Kerbol'

If you manage a positive score you can apply this TBD badge to you signature.
